title: Lord of the rings
creator_credit: Ralph Bakshi, Saul Zaentz, Fantasy Films and United Artists Corporation
brief_description: J. R. R. Tolkien’s massive three volume saga tells the story of how a few brave individuals manage to avert the Apocalypse by their boldness, chivalry, self-sacrifice and faith. Ralph Bakshi, America’s foremost new-style animator, translates this “impossible dream” into a full-length cartoon in a way that respects Tolkien’s story and inspiration, turning a literary classic into a magical visual experience. A large cast of mainly British voices, including John Hurt’s, excites the discriminating ear as much as the movie enchants the eye. Peter S. Beagle co-wrote the screenplay with Chris Conkling.
